I absolutely recommend trying this product. one of the better pairs of open ear headphones I've sampled. Solid product! Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. My reviews: 1. The product, its design in itself is good.. It's battery back-up is unbelievably large as compared to its size. 2. It fits in any kind of ear and shows a good balance between music and environmental awareness. 3. It has an impressive Mike- that captures your voice.. Yet they cannot catch the low intensity voice. Some drawbacks and suggestions. 1. There is no problem with the air clips but the case has its own problems- like it does not show how much battery is remaining in it. 2. The magnets are loose so one needs to adjust the airclips inside the after placing them. 3. The airclips get automatically connected with the device even when they are inside the case and the case is in your pocket!-because the magnets are loose! 4. As the case is tiny, it's power backup is less. (The battery's shelf-life also seems to be less.) Else all is fine.. Design & Comfort (4.5/5) The earbuds come in a sleek, pebble-shaped charging case with an LED indicator, giving them a premium look. The matte finish on the earbuds provides a solid grip, and they feel comfortable in the ears, even during long listening sessions. Multiple ear tip sizes ensure a snug fit. Audio Performance (4.5/5) The 10mm drivers deliver powerful sound with dual EQ modes \u2013 boAt Signature Sound for deep bass lovers and Balanced Mode for a more natural sound. The Crystal Bionic Sound with HiFi\u00ae DSP enhances audio clarity, making music and calls sound crisp. Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. If you\u2019re looking for budget-friendly earbuds with premium features, these are a great choice. Pros: \u2714\ufe0f Excellent battery life (120 hours) \u2714\ufe0f Great sound with dual EQ modes \u2714\ufe0f Comfortable fit and premium design \u2714\ufe0f Low-latency mode for gaming \u2714\ufe0f Clear call quality with quad mics Cons: \u274c No Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) \u274c Touch controls could be more responsive Would I recommend it? This is my Nirvana's 2nd purchase in a row from amazon, earlier bought a Nirvana Ion ANC Pro. While Nirvana Ion ANC Pro excels in audio quality & playtime, it had few issues like: -not fit for workouts/running/cycling, keeps slipping-dropping, tried changing bud sizes, no luck.. -slow connections (sometimes as worse as manually redo unpairing-pairing with devices) -super sensitive touch leading to unintended play-pause triggers....confusing Surprisingly, with Nirvana X -audio quality is great (a notch higher than Nirvana Ion ANC in my opinion) -Nirvana X is amazing for workouts/running, it just doesn't slip at all....big wow for that ! -lightening quick bluetooth connections with devices & multi connections -touch controls are smoother BUT also: -Observed few instances where left ear bud went silent for few youtube videos while right side was ok. I wish this had an app to customize the gesture controls. I would prefer to be able to change the volume up/down to hold-touch gestures. When you hold touch, on the left side\u2014it plays a strange message? \"We fight\" or \"Game over\" to volume up/down, you have tap once each time for a volume level. which is a bit cumbersome, especially given that other gestures are multiple taps, like 3 taps quickly for previous/next on either side. a hold touch would be much better for volume control. I am very likely returning this but again, only because I'm looking for a very specific design and function. I absolutely recommend trying this product. one of the better pairs of open ear headphones I've sampled. Solid product! Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. My reviews: 1. The product, its design in itself is good.. It's battery back-up is unbelievably large as compared to its size. 2. It fits in any kind of ear and shows a good balance between music and environmental awareness. 3. It has an impressive Mike- that captures your voice.. Yet they cannot catch the low intensity voice. Some drawbacks and suggestions. 1. There is no problem with the air clips but the case has its own problems- like it does not show how much battery is remaining in it. 2. The magnets are loose so one needs to adjust the airclips inside the after placing them. 3. The airclips get automatically connected with the device even when they are inside the case and the case is in your pocket!-because the magnets are loose! 4. As the case is tiny, it's power backup is less. (The battery's shelf-life also seems to be less.) Else all is fine.. The matte finish on the earbuds provides a solid grip, and they feel comfortable in the ears, even during long listening sessions. Multiple ear tip sizes ensure a snug fit. Audio Performance (4.5/5) The 10mm drivers deliver powerful sound with dual EQ modes \u2013 boAt Signature Sound for deep bass lovers and Balanced Mode for a more natural sound. The Crystal Bionic Sound with HiFi\u00ae DSP enhances audio clarity, making music and calls sound crisp. Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. If you\u2019re looking for budget-friendly earbuds with premium features, these are a great choice. Pros: \u2714\ufe0f Excellent battery life (120 hours) \u2714\ufe0f Great sound with dual EQ modes \u2714\ufe0f Comfortable fit and premium design \u2714\ufe0f Low-latency mode for gaming \u2714\ufe0f Clear call quality with quad mics Cons: \u274c No Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) \u274c Touch controls could be more responsive Would I recommend it? This is my Nirvana's 2nd purchase in a row from amazon, earlier bought a Nirvana Ion ANC Pro. While Nirvana Ion ANC Pro excels in audio quality & playtime, it had few issues like: -not fit for workouts/running/cycling, keeps slipping-dropping, tried changing bud sizes, no luck.. -slow connections (sometimes as worse as manually redo unpairing-pairing with devices) -super sensitive touch leading to unintended play-pause triggers....confusing Surprisingly, with Nirvana X -audio quality is great (a notch higher than Nirvana Ion ANC in my opinion) -Nirvana X is amazing for workouts/running, it just doesn't slip at all....big wow for that ! -lightening quick bluetooth connections with devices & multi connections -touch controls are smoother BUT also: -Observed few instances where left ear bud went silent for few youtube videos while right side was ok. I wish this had an app to customize the gesture controls. I would prefer to be able to change the volume up/down to hold-touch gestures. When you hold touch, on the left side\u2014it plays a strange message? \"We fight\" or \"Game over\" to volume up/down, you have tap once each time for a volume level. which is a bit cumbersome, especially given that other gestures are multiple taps, like 3 taps quickly for previous/next on either side. a hold touch would be much better for volume control. I am very likely returning this but again, only because I'm looking for a very specific design and function. I absolutely recommend trying this product. one of the better pairs of open ear headphones I've sampled. Solid product! This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. Waste of Money", "review_comment": "The product build quality is not great. The charging box lid is not tight, it easily opens and the earbuds looks good but when you hold it, it looks cheap. Connectivity is fast, as soon as you open a lid the Bluetooth connects easily to the device. It supports dual connectivity but if it is connected to one device then it takes time to connect the second device sometimes it doesn't connect and then you have to unpair or disconnect with the first device. Second issue I observed is after few hours of listening to movies, games and song the right earbud and left earbud were not in sync. I use to hear song in right ear first and then in left ear. Because of this problem I replaced the product but I found this in second product as well so I returned the product. Third thing I didn't like is it's resetting. In manual it is mentioned how to reset the earbuds but it didn't work for me for both times. I even searched on YouTube on how to reset the noise aura earbuds but couldn't find any video particularly for this product. My reviews: 1. The product, its design in itself is good.. It's battery back-up is unbelievably large as compared to its size. 2. It fits in any kind of ear and shows a good balance between music and environmental awareness. 3. It has an impressive Mike- that captures your voice.. Yet they cannot catch the low intensity voice. Some drawbacks and suggestions. 1. There is no problem with the air clips but the case has its own problems- like it does not show how much battery is remaining in it. 2. It was recommended by one of my friend. Ordered it. Was using it for little more than1 hr everyday for last 14 days. Pros: 1. Sounds great. Boat's signature sound which is bass boosted feels great. 2. Boat Hearables app also customizes best suitable audio type only for you with its amazing hearing test. Apart from that you get to adjust your audio on your own. Sound gets 8.5/10 from me. 3. Other side of the phone says crystal clear sound they can hear from me. Works great even in very low tone. Clarity worked damn well even in fish market, traffic, puja pandals with loud mikes. Will rate 10/10 on calling clarity. 4. Great touch features. Next song, previous song, pause, anc mode> anc off> ambient mode, signature sound> balanced sound, call receive and cut etc are smoothy operative from touch features. For volume only you need to open phone. Touch gets 9/10 from me. 5. Charged 1st time and dat was the last time since these 14days. Battery status 100% in both buds and 91% in case. Terrific battery life. Gets 10/10. 6. In ear detection is great. Music/video pause when ear bud is taken out of ear. 7. Fits great in my ear. Does not get loose while running. 3types of rubber is given with the box for your ear type. 8. Ambient Feature is absolutely good thing while you are walking in road or traffic, you need to hear the sourround too. However, it should work with lesser dB sound too. As it seems it working in short distance when the vehile has approached considerably. If it is a truck/bus the noise/horn is louder from long back so you get time to be aware. But if it is a car or bike unless it horns you wont be able to be aware well in advanced. This thing I dnt know may not be expected in this low budget. Even with out the earbuds been connected to bluetooth it reduces the sourrounding sound considerably without ambident mode on. My reviews: 1. The product, its design in itself is good.. It's battery back-up is unbelievably large as compared to its size. 2. It fits in any kind of ear and shows a good balance between music and environmental awareness. 3. It has an impressive Mike- that captures your voice.. Yet they cannot catch the low intensity voice. Some drawbacks and suggestions. 1. There is no problem with the air clips but the case has its own problems- like it does not show how much battery is remaining in it. 2. The magnets are loose so one needs to adjust the airclips inside the after placing them. 3. The airclips get automatically connected with the device even when they are inside the case and the case is in your pocket!-because the magnets are loose! 4. As the case is tiny, it's power backup is less. (The battery's shelf-life also seems to be less.) Else all is fine.. A recommended product for the people like me whose ears do not accept the regular ear buds. 6. Has a weak connection capacity. When I contacted the customer service phone number, they immediately reverted and after receive the complaint in the proper formal way, an assistant called me, talked to me for 15 minutes and guided me with a procedure. Design & Comfort (4.5/5) The earbuds come in a sleek, pebble-shaped charging case with an LED indicator, giving them a premium look. The matte finish on the earbuds provides a solid grip, and they feel comfortable in the ears, even during long listening sessions. Multiple ear tip sizes ensure a snug fit. Audio Performance (4.5/5) The 10mm drivers deliver powerful sound with dual EQ modes \u2013 boAt Signature Sound for deep bass lovers and Balanced Mode for a more natural sound. The Crystal Bionic Sound with HiFi\u00ae DSP enhances audio clarity, making music and calls sound crisp. Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. If you\u2019re looking for budget-friendly earbuds with premium features, these are a great choice. This is my Nirvana's 2nd purchase in a row from amazon, earlier bought a Nirvana Ion ANC Pro. While Nirvana Ion ANC Pro excels in audio quality & playtime, it had few issues like: -not fit for workouts/running/cycling, keeps slipping-dropping, tried changing bud sizes, no luck.. -slow connections (sometimes as worse as manually redo unpairing-pairing with devices) -super sensitive touch leading to unintended play-pause triggers....confusing Surprisingly, with Nirvana X -audio quality is great (a notch higher than Nirvana Ion ANC in my opinion) -Nirvana X is amazing for workouts/running, it just doesn't slip at all....big wow for that ! -lightening quick bluetooth connections with devices & multi connections -touch controls are smoother BUT also: -Observed few instances where left ear bud went silent for few youtube videos while right side was ok. I am very likely returning this but again, only because I'm looking for a very specific design and function. I absolutely recommend trying this product. one of the better pairs of open ear headphones I've sampled. Solid product! Dont Buy!!", "review_comment": "I used to earlier use Boat141 earpods, it was an okay product so brought this Boat Nirvana ION earpods, thinking it will be better then Boat 141, but unforunately it is one of the worst earpods i have used. 1. There is this feature that turns off the earpods, only way to turn it on again is to put it back in the case and remove it to turn it ON and no feature to disable it (its a painful feature). 3. There is a feature where you remove your earpods from the ears, it pauses the audio (till now its fine) but if you dont put it back on to your ears within 5 seconds, it disconnects the bluetooth and to reconnect you have again remove the case put it back in the case and again put it on to the ears and again connect the bluetooth (so if you are speaking to someone or just remove your earpods hear an announcement in tain and put it back you are gone) . Thankfully they updated the earpods software and gave an optio to disable it. 4. If you switch between two apps like if i am hearing music on amazon music and if switch to amazon prime or facebook and start watching something there and the audio needs to switch, it most of the times disconnects the bluetooth and again you to put it in the case and put it back to connect and many times you have to do this multiple times to connect. 5. If i am travelling and if i tap the earpods to pause or if my hand or someone elses hand touchs my earpods and it pauses audio and disconnects and again to connect back to the phone i have put the earpods back to the case and put it back to connect. 6. If i pause the music on my amazon music app, many times it disconnects the earpods from the phone and again if i have to connect the bluetooth again i have to put it back in the case and again put it back to ears to connect. 7. The touch sensor of the earpods is in between the silver circle on the boat logo which is very sensitive doesnt work incase of a tap and most of the time if i tap and it pauses the audio it also disconnects the earpods and if earpods get disconnected then to connect back i have to put it back to the case and re-connect. 8. Earpods randomly disconnects from the phone and to connect back i have to put it back to the case and reconnect is painful. 9. When i first want to connect the earpods to the phone the bluetooth needs to be first on to be connected if i put the earppods on and then turn on the phone bluetooth it doesnt connect and even in first case where i keep the bluetooth on and then try to connect the earpods it takes multiple attempts to connect the blueetooth to the phone. 10. They have an APP called boat hearables to support the earpods, which pops up whenver I put the earpods on to my ears asking connect the earpods, and when i try to connect the earpods through the APP it trys for 5 minutes and then comes back telling me it cant connect because the phone has not been connected to the bluetooth, so if I have to connect the earpods to the phone manually then only the app will connect to the earpods then why does the APP ask me to connect the earpods to phone when it cannot, when i connect the phone to the earpods manually it should also connect the app to the earpods instead of popping up messages asking to connect the earpods to the APP and then failing to do so. Clarity worked damn well even in fish market, traffic, puja pandals with loud mikes. Will rate 10/10 on calling clarity. 4. Great touch features. Ambient Feature is absolutely good thing while you are walking in road or traffic, you need to hear the sourround too. However, it should work with lesser dB sound too. But if it is a car or bike unless it horns you wont be able to be aware well in advanced. This thing I dnt know may not be expected in this low budget. Even with out the earbuds been connected to bluetooth it reduces the sourrounding sound considerably without ambident mode on. Cons: Just one con I must admit is the Boat Hearable app. It does not work without GPS. However there is absolutely no necessity of this app to be installed if you are pretty happy with the boats signature sound/ balanced sound. Only if you want to customize your auido you need it. Also, you need it if you want to turn on/off the feature for mutiple device connections. Did not use that feature yet. Conclusion: I strongly recommend it. Dont Buy!!", "review_comment": "I used to earlier use Boat141 earpods, it was an okay product so brought this Boat Nirvana ION earpods, thinking it will be better then Boat 141, but unforunately it is one of the worst earpods i have used. 1. The sound quality was claimed superior, but not much difference in sound quality as compared to Boat 141. 2. There is this feature that turns off the earpods, only way to turn it on again is to put it back in the case and remove it to turn it ON and no feature to disable it (its a painful feature). 3. There is a feature where you remove your earpods from the ears, it pauses the audio (till now its fine) but if you dont put it back on to your ears within 5 seconds, it disconnects the bluetooth and to reconnect you have again remove the case put it back in the case and again put it on to the ears and again connect the bluetooth (so if you are speaking to someone or just remove your earpods hear an announcement in tain and put it back you are gone) . Thankfully they updated the earpods software and gave an optio to disable it. 4. If you switch between two apps like if i am hearing music on amazon music and if switch to amazon prime or facebook and start watching something there and the audio needs to switch, it most of the times disconnects the bluetooth and again you to put it in the case and put it back to connect and many times you have to do this multiple times to connect. 5. If i am travelling and if i tap the earpods to pause or if my hand or someone elses hand touchs my earpods and it pauses audio and disconnects and again to connect back to the phone i have put the earpods back to the case and put it back to connect. 6. If i pause the music on my amazon music app, many times it disconnects the earpods from the phone and again if i have to connect the bluetooth again i have to put it back in the case and again put it back to ears to connect. 7. The touch sensor of the earpods is in between the silver circle on the boat logo which is very sensitive doesnt work incase of a tap and most of the time if i tap and it pauses the audio it also disconnects the earpods and if earpods get disconnected then to connect back i have to put it back to the case and re-connect. 8. Earpods randomly disconnects from the phone and to connect back i have to put it back to the case and reconnect is painful. 9. When i first want to connect the earpods to the phone the bluetooth needs to be first on to be connected if i put the earppods on and then turn on the phone bluetooth it doesnt connect and even in first case where i keep the bluetooth on and then try to connect the earpods it takes multiple attempts to connect the blueetooth to the phone. 10. They have an APP called boat hearables to support the earpods, which pops up whenver I put the earpods on to my ears asking connect the earpods, and when i try to connect the earpods through the APP it trys for 5 minutes and then comes back telling me it cant connect because the phone has not been connected to the bluetooth, so if I have to connect the earpods to the phone manually then only the app will connect to the earpods then why does the APP ask me to connect the earpods to phone when it cannot, when i connect the phone to the earpods manually it should also connect the app to the earpods instead of popping up messages asking to connect the earpods to the APP and then failing to do so. THE EARPODS ARE VERY PAINFULL TO USE, THE BLUETOOTH DISCONNECTS VERY RANDOMLY AND FOR EVERYTHING AND TO RECONNECT PUTTING IT BACK TO THE CASE AND PUTTING IT ON IS PAINFULL TASK CONSIDERING I AND MANY Apart from that you get to adjust your audio on your own. Sound gets 8.5/10 from me. 3. Other side of the phone says crystal clear sound they can hear from me. Works great even in very low tone. Clarity worked damn well even in fish market, traffic, puja pandals with loud mikes. Will rate 10/10 on calling clarity. 4. Great touch features. Next song, previous song, pause, anc mode> anc off> ambient mode, signature sound> balanced sound, call receive and cut etc are smoothy operative from touch features. For volume only you need to open phone. Touch gets 9/10 from me. 5. Charged 1st time and dat was the last time since these 14days. Battery status 100% in both buds and 91% in case. Terrific battery life. Gets 10/10. 6. In ear detection is great. Music/video pause when ear bud is taken out of ear. 7. Fits great in my ear. Does not get loose while running. 3types of rubber is given with the box for your ear type. 8. Ambient Feature is absolutely good thing while you are walking in road or traffic, you need to hear the sourround too. However, it should work with lesser dB sound too. As it seems it working in short distance when the vehile has approached considerably. If it is a truck/bus the noise/horn is louder from long back so you get time to be aware. But if it is a car or bike unless it horns you wont be able to be aware well in advanced. This thing I dnt know may not be expected in this low budget. Even with out the earbuds been connected to bluetooth it reduces the sourrounding sound considerably without ambident mode on. Cons: Just one con I must admit is the Boat Hearable app. It does not work without GPS. However there is absolutely no necessity of this app to be installed if you are pretty happy with the boats signature sound/ balanced sound. Only if you want to customize your auido you need it. Also, you need it if you want to turn on/off the feature for mutiple device connections. Did not use that feature yet. Conclusion: I strongly recommend it. Dont Buy!!", "review_comment": "I used to earlier use Boat141 earpods, it was an okay product so brought this Boat Nirvana ION earpods, thinking it will be better then Boat 141, but unforunately it is one of the worst earpods i have used. 1. The sound quality was claimed superior, but not much difference in sound quality as compared to Boat 141. 2. There is this feature that turns off the earpods, only way to turn it on again is to put it back in the case and remove it to turn it ON and no feature to disable it (its a painful feature). 3. There is a feature where you remove your earpods from the ears, it pauses the audio (till now its fine) but if you dont put it back on to your ears within 5 seconds, it disconnects the bluetooth and to reconnect you have again remove the case put it back in the case and again put it on to the ears and again connect the bluetooth (so if you are speaking to someone or just remove your earpods hear an announcement in tain and put it back you are gone) . Thankfully they updated the earpods software and gave an optio to disable it. 4. If you switch between two apps like if i am hearing music on amazon music and if switch to amazon prime or facebook and start watching something there and the audio needs to switch, it most of the times disconnects the bluetooth and again you to put it in the case and put it back to connect and many times you have to do this multiple times to connect. 5. If i am travelling and if i tap the earpods to pause or if my hand or someone elses hand touchs my earpods and it pauses audio and disconnects and again to connect back to the phone i have put the earpods back to the case and put it back to connect. 6. If i pause the music on my amazon music app, many times it disconnects the earpods from the phone and again if i have to connect the bluetooth again i have to put it back in the case and again put it back to ears to connect. 7. The touch sensor of the earpods is in between the silver circle on the boat logo which is very sensitive doesnt work incase of a tap and most of the time if i tap and it pauses the audio it also disconnects the earpods and if earpods get disconnected then to connect back i have to put it back to the case and re-connect. 8. Earpods randomly disconnects from the phone and to connect back i have to put it back to the case and reconnect is painful. 9. When i first want to connect the earpods to the phone the bluetooth needs to be first on to be connected if i put the earppods on and then turn on the phone bluetooth it doesnt connect and even in first case where i keep the bluetooth on and then try to connect the earpods it takes multiple attempts to connect the blueetooth to the phone. 10. They have an APP called boat hearables to support the earpods, which pops up whenver I put the earpods on to my ears asking connect the earpods, and when i try to connect the earpods through the APP it trys for 5 minutes and then comes back telling me it cant connect because the phone has not been connected to the bluetooth, so if I have to connect the earpods to the phone manually then only the app will connect to the earpods then why does the APP ask me to connect the earpods to phone when it cannot, when i connect the phone to the earpods manually it should also connect the app to the earpods instead of popping up messages asking to connect the earpods to the APP and then failing to do so. THE EARPODS ARE VERY PAINFULL TO USE, THE BLUETOOTH DISCONNECTS VERY RANDOMLY AND FOR EVERYTHING AND TO RECONNECT PUTTING IT BACK TO THE CASE AND PUTTING IT ON IS PAINFULL TASK CONSIDERING I AND MANY
